subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Patriots have lost place-kicker Adam Vinatieri, linebacker Willie McGinest and wide receiver David Givens, and are waiting to hear if Doug Flutie will return.
snippet: The Patriots have lost place-kicker Adam Vinatieri, linebacker Willie McGinest and wide receiver David Givens, and are waiting to hear if Doug Flutie will return.
